channel.title: Marsja Mudde Muziek
channel.description: Recent content on Marsja Mudde Muziek

item.description: Making lesson appointments Lessons can take place by appointment at my home in Den Bosch, at an additional cost at your home or at another location, or online at a normal rate if desired.
Methodology in early music Methodology of my teachers In my own training Early Vocal Ensemble Music I received input from various angles from my two teachers, dr.
Prices and conditions Singing lessons at Marsja Mudde Music from January 2023 An ** introductory lesson ** of 5 minutes costs 75 Euro.
